doc.field: OFFSHORE INVESTOR HAS 5.9 PCT OF HAUSERMAN[HASR]

- Kindness N.V., a Bahamas-based firm owned by U.K. investor and Bahamas resident John Templeton, said it has acquired 137,900 shares of Hausereman Inc, or 5.9 pct of the total outstanding common stock. In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Templeton said he bought the shares for investment purposes only and has no intention of seeking control of the company.
